Earth + Wind = Dust
Fire + Wind = Smoke
Dust + Earth = Planet
Fire + Planet = Sun
Dust + Planet = Earth
Sun + Wind = Sunflower
Smoke + Sunflower = Smoke Signal
c + o = u
n + o = t
L + i = n  // 13



Gen 1 - 39 Elements -> 39 Total Elements
Gen 2 - 149 Elements -> 188 Total Elements
Gen 3 - 501 Elements -> 689 Total Elements
Gen 4 - 1487 Elements -> 2176 Total Elements
Gen 5 - 4632 Elements -> 6808 Total Elements
Gen 6 - 0 Elements -> 6808 Total Elements

Cough + Sun = Sunstroke
A + Sunstroke = A+S
A+S + Sunstroke = A+s+s+s+s+s+s+s+s+s+
A+s+s+s+s+s+s+s+s+s+ + Smoke Signal = S.O.S.

5 - Clean Message: 
Dust + Water = Mud
Mud + Smoke Signal = Muddy Signal
Dust + Muddy Signal = Dirty Signal
Dirty Signal + Message = Dirty Message
Dirty Message + Mud = Clean Message

5 - Dirty Letter: 
Dust + Water = Mud
Mud + Smoke Signal = Muddy Signal
Dust + Muddy Signal = Dirty Signal
Dirty Signal + Message = Dirty Message
Dirty Message + Letter = Dirty Letter

5 - Spamflower: 
Dust + Message = Spam
Message + Spam = Scam
Scam + Spam = Scamspam
Scamspam + Sunflower = Scamflower
Scamflower + Spam = Spamflower

5 - Squirtle: 
Dust + Message = Spam
Message + Spam = Scam
Scam + Sun = Scorch
Scam + Scorch = Scorcham
Scorcham + Water = Squirtle

5 - Aaron: 
Dust + Smoke Signal = Cough
Cough + Sun = Sunstroke
A + Sunstroke = A+S
A+S + Cough = Ascough
A + Ascough = Aaron

5 - Hexagram: 
Letter + Smoke Signal = Telegram
Smoke Signal + Telegram = Text Message
Earth + Text Message = Sext
Sext + Telegram = Sextagram
Sextagram + Sextagram = Hexagram

5 - Sexagram: 
Letter + Smoke Signal = Telegram
Smoke Signal + Telegram = Text Message
Earth + Text Message = Sext
Sext + Telegram = Sextagram
Sextagram + Telegram = Sexagram

5 - Scorched Letter: 
Dust + Message = Spam
Message + Spam = Scam
Scam + Sun = Scorch
Scorch + Spam = Scorched Spam
Letter + Scorched Spam = Scorched Letter

5 - B-text Message: 
Letter + Smoke Signal = Telegram
Smoke Signal + Telegram = Text Message
A + Text Message = A-Text
A-Text + A-Text = B-text
B-text + Text Message = B-text Message

5 - B-message: 
Letter + Smoke Signal = Telegram
Smoke Signal + Telegram = Text Message
A + Text Message = A-Text
A-Text + A-Text = B-text
B-text + Message = B-message

5 - A-dust-a-telegram: 
Letter + Smoke Signal = Telegram
A + Telegram = A-Telegram
A-Telegram + Dust = A-dust
A-dust + A-Telegram = A-dust-a-gram
A-dust-a-gram + A-Telegram = A-dust-a-telegram

5 - Dust-a-gram: 
Letter + Smoke Signal = Telegram
A + Telegram = A-Telegram
A-Telegram + Dust = A-dust
A-dust + A-Telegram = A-dust-a-gram
A-dust-a-gram + Dust = Dust-a-gram

5 - Fire-breathing Dragon: 
Letter + Smoke Signal = Telegram
A + Telegram = A-Telegram
A-Telegram + Fire = Fire-telegram
Fire-telegram + Letter = Fire-letter
Fire + Fire-letter = Fire-breathing Dragon

5 - A-telegram-telluric-telegram: 
Letter + Smoke Signal = Telegram
A + Telegram = A-Telegram
A-Telegram + Earth = A-telluric
A-Telegram + A-telluric = A-telluric-telegram
A-Telegram + A-telluric-telegram = A-telegram-telluric-telegram

5 - A-telluric-telegram-telluric: 
Letter + Smoke Signal = Telegram
A + Telegram = A-Telegram
A-Telegram + Earth = A-telluric
A-Telegram + A-telluric = A-telluric-telegram
A-telluric + A-telluric-telegram = A-telluric-telegram-telluric

5 - Seismograph: 
Letter + Smoke Signal = Telegram
A + Telegram = A-Telegram
A-Telegram + Earth = A-telluric
A-Telegram + A-telluric = A-telluric-telegram
A-telluric-telegram + Earth = Seismograph

5 - Solar-flare: 
Letter + Smoke Signal = Telegram
A + Telegram = A-Telegram
A-Telegram + Earth = A-telluric
A-Telegram + A-telluric = A-telluric-telegram
A-telluric-telegram + Sun = Solar-flare
